name: Set of Five Sakura Wall Art Panels - Distressed Ochre
description: Sakura is the name for cherry blossom season in Japan. These five handmade panels display traditional paintings of flowers and birds in a quietly elegant style. The designs are hand painted onto ochre-stained glass, which then casts shadows on the wall for a 3D effect when the light shines through them. Each piece will have individual characteristics due to the artisanal process.
